page.title: 19Employment
page.content: The traditional employment of the area has been based on agriculture and the railways.Over the years ,however people have tended to move away from these traditional areas,and now work in the nearby towns of Cardiff ,Newport and Bristol. Recently ,with large international companies establishing their bases in the locality employment can again be offered to local people nearer to home.Of these companies, the Whitbread Brewery in Magor in the largest single employer. As Magor is located along the M4 motorway in what is called the "Silicon Corridor" many micro-electric companies have moved to the area.Many of the newcomers to the village are employed in these industries.
